synopsis.text: Ross Sylibus and Naomi Armitage, a unique android with the extraordinary ability to bear human children, have left behind their past identities to embrace a tranquil family life on Mars with their daughter, Yoko. However, the calm is shattered as Mars's struggle for independence from Earth and robot rights resurfaces, drawing unwanted attention towards Naomi's unique gift. Meanwhile, an android uprising at an anti-matter plant on Earth reveals a sinister plot to illicitly produce more advanced androids, known as Third Types, leading Naomi to confront her most formidable adversaries yet â€“ clones of herself. As the battle unfolds, Naomi must fight not only for her life but also to protect her family and the future of Mars.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
